thread.section_title: TerraTrike Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TerraTrike | www.terratrike.com
thread.title: Mike Malever :

author: Mike Malever :
title: Mike Malever :
text: The title says it all. I ordered on the phone and all my questions and needs were addressed. Later, I even modified my order requiring a refund which was received in a timely manner. The Trike was shipped quickly and was completely assembled. My trash collector even picked up the empty box which was as big as a coffin! I (74 yo) purchased another Trike from a dealer a few years ago. This one is for my wife (69 yo). These Trikes are great for older people, especially those with some medical limitations. Thanks to Taylor and everyone at Terra Trike!
